alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:28PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Natrona County through 415 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Goldeneye Reservoir to near Alcova. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homa Hills and Antelope Hills. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
